structure.unit: Officers And Employees Of Cities, Towns And Districts

law.catch_line: Maximum Amount Of Additional Compensation For Serving As Member Of Registrars Of Voters
law.text: Notwithstanding the limitation contained in section nineteen G, in a city or town which accepts this section the total amount of additional compensation payable to its clerk who also serves as a member of its board of registrars of voters shall not exceed two thousand dollars.
